evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: Plaintiffs’ complaint alleges claims against the government for (1) retaliation and viewpoint discrimination in violation of the First Amendment to the U.S. Constitution; (2) ultra vires action by the President in violation of Chapter 71 of Title 5 of the U.S. Code; (3) deprivations of procedural due process in violation of the Fifth Amendment; (4) abrogation of property rights in a federal contract in violation of the Fifth Amendment; and (5) arbitrary and irrational classification in violation of the Equal Protection component of the Fifth Amendment.
